Sentence.value: You may have this test if you have an unexplained fever or if your health care provider thinks you have an infection of the bone marrow.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: You may have this test if you have an unexplained fever or if your [[health care provider|C0018724]] thinks you have an [[infection|C0009450]] of the [[bone marrow|C0005953]].

Sentence.value: Abnormal results suggest that you have an infection of the bone marrow.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Abnormal results suggest that you have an [[infection|C0009450]] of the [[bone marrow|C0005953]].
